CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 24, 1945, pg. 3, reads: "Still With Us - The campaign against "hokey piles" is several months old. Nevertheless, the piles were still in evidence in many parts of the lower Hill District this week, as is evidenced by this pile of rubbish on a fire escape, in barrels, and on the street at 164 Fullerton Street this week. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Fire escape between two brick buildings, three barrels, and street covered in debris and trash, 164 Fullerton Street, Hill District
